bug.author: wmpauli
bug.description:
The readme file in the following folder contains a dead link: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/tree/master/how-to-use-azureml/azure-databricks>https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/tree/master/how-to-use-azureml/azure-databricks</denchmark-link>
dead link: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/azure-databricks/Databricks_AMLSDK_1-4_6.dbc>https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/blob/master/how-to-use-azureml/azure-databricks/Databricks_AMLSDK_1-4_6.dbc</denchmark-link>
The dbc archive is missing.

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback! We are currently investigating and will update you shortly.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/YutongTie-MSFT>@YutongTie-MSFT</denchmark-link> This dead link is still not fixed. Can anyone fix this? If we're no longer providing .dbc, the reference to it should be eliminated.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/DebFro>@DebFro</denchmark-link> can you please update under in this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Azure/MachineLearningNotebooks/tree/master/how-to-use-azureml/azure-databricks>document</denchmark-link> ? Thanks.
